name: Computer Troubles (mkhoi)
description:
You brought home a computer a month ago. And now you woke up, finding yourself inside of it. Now you have to try to escape your evil computer.

Controls: 

  • AD to move left and right
  • W or space to jump
  • Left click to slash
  • Shift to dash
  • Esc to pause

You can find more in the "How to play" button in the game.

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #37.

I hope you have fun despite this being a bit scuffed.
